desc.en: アルの頼みを受けて事業説明会に到着した先生。しかし、説明会は支離滅裂な内容で、アルは落ち込んでしまう。先生はそんなアルを宥めるために、特別な場所へ案内するのであった。
desc.jp: アルの頼みを受けて事業説明会に到着した先生。しかし、説明会は支離滅裂な内容で、アルは落ち込んでしまう。先生はそんなアルを宥めるために、特別な場所へ案内するのであった。
desc.zh_cn: アルの頼みを受けて事业说明会に到着した先生。しかし、说明会は支离灭裂な内容で、アルは落ち込んでしまう。先生はそんなアルを宥めるために、特别な场所へ案内するのであった。

BG_ConventionHall3_Sunset.jpg Description
BG_RamenYa.jpg Description

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 亞瑠在新春活動會場內努力地搖著御神籤桶，然而無論她怎麼搖，她都只搖到不吉利的御神籤。幸好，在看到老師搖到的御神籤後，原本垂頭喪氣的亞瑠總算露出了心滿意足的笑容。
desc.jp: 亞瑠在新春活動會場內努力地搖著御神籤桶，然而無論她怎麼搖，她都只搖到不吉利的御神籤。幸好，在看到老師搖到的御神籤後，原本垂頭喪氣的亞瑠總算露出了心滿意足的笑容。
desc.zh_cn: 亚瑠在新春活动会场内努力地摇着御神签桶，然而无论她怎么摇，她都只摇到不吉利的御神签。幸好，在看到老师摇到的御神签后，原本垂头丧气的亚瑠总算露出了心满意足的笑容。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 雖然為了遊玩才來到無人島，但綾音卻在翻找著倉庫。老師為了不讓綾音對自己的樣子感到失望，便陪著她一起。

desc.en: 為了安慰失去鬍子的潔莉諾，老師便特地買了一瓶水果牛奶給她。由於喝完牛奶後，嘴邊會多一圈看起來很像鬍子的白色牛奶漬，因此潔莉諾便從此愛上了牛奶。不幸的是，因為潔莉諾一直不停地喝牛奶，所以她後來便開始瘋狂拉肚子。
desc.jp: 為了安慰失去鬍子的潔莉諾，老師便特地買了一瓶水果牛奶給她。由於喝完牛奶後，嘴邊會多一圈看起來很像鬍子的白色牛奶漬，因此潔莉諾便從此愛上了牛奶。不幸的是，因為潔莉諾一直不停地喝牛奶，所以她後來便開始瘋狂拉肚子。
desc.zh_cn: 为了安慰失去胡子的洁莉诺，老师便特地买了一瓶水果牛奶给她。由于喝完牛奶后，嘴边会多一圈看起来很像胡子的白色牛奶渍，因此洁莉诺便从此爱上了牛奶。不幸的是，因为洁莉诺一直不停地喝牛奶，所以她后来便开始疯狂拉肚子。

desc.en: 羽留奈勸說老師試吃分子料理。老師覺得那口感很神奇，但分子料理本身對人們來說還是很陌生。於是，羽留奈便提議提供人們最熟悉的分子料理——棉花糖，並且這個提案也成功開始運作了。
desc.jp: 羽留奈勸說老師試吃分子料理。老師覺得那口感很神奇，但分子料理本身對人們來說還是很陌生。於是，羽留奈便提議提供人們最熟悉的分子料理——棉花糖，並且這個提案也成功開始運作了。
desc.zh_cn: 羽留奈劝说老师试吃分子料理。老师觉得那口感很神奇，但分子料理本身对人们来说还是很陌生。于是，羽留奈便提议提供人们最熟悉的分子料理——棉花糖，并且这个提案也成功开始运作了。
BG_Yatai.jpg Description

desc.en: 晄輪大祭當日。蓮實雖然在進行飲食管理，但卻因為周圍的學生在談論食物而動搖了。老師提議和蓮實一起吃「蜂蜜漬檸檬」。蓮實雖然叮嚀自己要少吃一點，但卻因為食慾爆發而全部吃光了。
desc.jp: 晄輪大祭當日。蓮實雖然在進行飲食管理，但卻因為周圍的學生在談論食物而動搖了。老師提議和蓮實一起吃「蜂蜜漬檸檬」。蓮實雖然叮嚀自己要少吃一點，但卻因為食慾爆發而全部吃光了。
desc.zh_cn: 晄轮大祭当日。莲实虽然在进行饮食管理，但却因为周围的学生在谈论食物而动摇了。老师提议和莲实一起吃「蜂蜜渍柠檬」。莲实虽然叮咛自己要少吃一点，但却因为食欲爆发而全部吃光了。

desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: 色々な職業を体験してから、一番好きなことが何なのかを考えてみたと言うイブキ。彼女が選んだのは「先生」だった。イブキは自らセットした小さな教室に先生を招き、楽しく算数の授業を始めるのだった。

desc.en: 老師在商場遇見了盯著吉他看的一花。一花說自己看到別人認真彈吉他，於是在想要不要也來彈吉他。不過一花卻想要打消念頭，表示自己對吉他其實沒有太大的興趣時，老師則拜託一花彈吉他給自己聽。
desc.jp: 老師在商場遇見了盯著吉他看的一花。一花說自己看到別人認真彈吉他，於是在想要不要也來彈吉他。不過一花卻想要打消念頭，表示自己對吉他其實沒有太大的興趣時，老師則拜託一花彈吉他給自己聽。
desc.zh_cn: 老师在商场遇见了盯着吉他看的一花。一花说自己看到别人认真弹吉他，于是在想要不要也来弹吉他。不过一花却想要打消念头，表示自己对吉他其实没有太大的兴趣时，老师则拜托一花弹吉他给自己听。

desc.en: 又再次以修行為藉口，專注在堆沙堡的伊樹菜和老師。伊樹菜雖然因為超乎意料之外的難度而感到慌張，但還是沒有放棄，並和老師一起完成了沙堡。
desc.jp: 又再次以修行為藉口，專注在堆沙堡的伊樹菜和老師。伊樹菜雖然因為超乎意料之外的難度而感到慌張，但還是沒有放棄，並和老師一起完成了沙堡。
desc.zh_cn: 又再次以修行为借口，专注在堆沙堡的伊树菜和老师。伊树菜虽然因为超乎意料之外的难度而感到慌张，但还是没有放弃，并和老师一起完成了沙堡。

desc.en: 茱莉為了探索料理中要加入多少愛心才合適，因而邀請老師招待老師吃料理。每當老師要吃料理時都會經歷許大大小小的事。儘管如此，老師還是為了茱莉，堅持把料理全部吃完。
desc.jp: 茱莉為了探索料理中要加入多少愛心才合適，因而邀請老師招待老師吃料理。每當老師要吃料理時都會經歷許大大小小的事。儘管如此，老師還是為了茱莉，堅持把料理全部吃完。
desc.zh_cn: 茱莉为了探索料理中要加入多少爱心才合适，因而邀请老师招待老师吃料理。每当老师要吃料理时都会经历许大大小小的事。尽管如此，老师还是为了茱莉，坚持把料理全部吃完。

desc.en: 因為不滿修行部平時都被當成怪人，楓主張應該進行改變認知的活動。在和楓一起從事各種活動後，老師隱約地明白了為什麼修行部會被這樣評論。
desc.jp: 因為不滿修行部平時都被當成怪人，楓主張應該進行改變認知的活動。在和楓一起從事各種活動後，老師隱約地明白了為什麼修行部會被這樣評論。
desc.zh_cn: 因为不满修行部平时都被当成怪人，枫主张应该进行改变认知的活动。在和枫一起从事各种活动后，老师隐约地明白了为什么修行部会被这样评论。

desc.en: 從新年初就開始忙碌的老師。為了安撫身心疲憊的老師，佳世子提議一起去聽和樂器的表演。雖然老師很期待平靜的和樂器表演，但佳世子介紹的表演卻是重金屬音樂風的和樂器表演。
desc.jp: 從新年初就開始忙碌的老師。為了安撫身心疲憊的老師，佳世子提議一起去聽和樂器的表演。雖然老師很期待平靜的和樂器表演，但佳世子介紹的表演卻是重金屬音樂風的和樂器表演。
desc.zh_cn: 从新年初就开始忙碌的老师。为了安抚身心疲惫的老师，佳世子提议一起去听和乐器的表演。虽然老师很期待平静的和乐器表演，但佳世子介绍的表演却是重金属音乐风的和乐器表演。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: 擔任幼兒園學生觀摩導覽工作的桐乃。桐乃在示範使用手銬的方式時，因為失誤把自己銬在柱子上。桐乃因為觀摩弄得一團糟而感到自責，但是幼兒園的學生們感受到桐乃的真摯並替她加油。
desc.jp: 擔任幼兒園學生觀摩導覽工作的桐乃。桐乃在示範使用手銬的方式時，因為失誤把自己銬在柱子上。桐乃因為觀摩弄得一團糟而感到自責，但是幼兒園的學生們感受到桐乃的真摯並替她加油。
desc.zh_cn: 担任幼儿园学生观摩导览工作的桐乃。桐乃在示范使用手铐的方式时，因为失误把自己铐在柱子上。桐乃因为观摩弄得一团糟而感到自责，但是幼儿园的学生们感受到桐乃的真挚并替她加油。
BG_CityOffice.jpg Description
BG_BuildingFrontGate.jpg Description
BG_Campus_Sunset.jpg Description

long.jp: ヴァルキューレ警察学校

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 亞都梨來找老師，說有東西要給老師看。亞都梨想給老師看的東西是伸展運動。亞都梨氣勢十足地開始拉筋，不過做得卻沒有預期中好，這讓他感到沮喪。老師安慰亞都梨，一起繼續拉筋。
desc.jp: 亞都梨來找老師，說有東西要給老師看。亞都梨想給老師看的東西是伸展運動。亞都梨氣勢十足地開始拉筋，不過做得卻沒有預期中好，這讓他感到沮喪。老師安慰亞都梨，一起繼續拉筋。
desc.zh_cn: 亚都梨来找老师，说有东西要给老师看。亚都梨想给老师看的东西是伸展运动。亚都梨气势十足地开始拉筋，不过做得却没有预期中好，这让他感到沮丧。老师安慰亚都梨，一起继续拉筋。

desc.en: 在三一大教堂私有公園散步的老師，遇見了正在運動的瑪麗。看到瑪麗談論因為大運動此一契機轉變的心態，老師感到很滿足。老師一路等到瑪麗運動完畢，一起回去夏萊。
desc.jp: 在三一大教堂私有公園散步的老師，遇見了正在運動的瑪麗。看到瑪麗談論因為大運動此一契機轉變的心態，老師感到很滿足。老師一路等到瑪麗運動完畢，一起回去夏萊。
desc.zh_cn: 在三一大教堂私有公园散步的老师，遇见了正在运动的玛丽。看到玛丽谈论因为大运动此一契机转变的心态，老师感到很满足。老师一路等到玛丽运动完毕，一起回去夏莱。
BG_Park_Night.jpg Description

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 老師去找惠，發現惠正在專心看著逐漸融化的「咯哩咯哩君」冰淇淋。惠正在使用自己的武器讓咯哩咯哩君融化，老師則建議她試著等一下。
desc.jp: 老師去找惠，發現惠正在專心看著逐漸融化的「咯哩咯哩君」冰淇淋。惠正在使用自己的武器讓咯哩咯哩君融化，老師則建議她試著等一下。

desc.en: 老師在接獲彌香的聯絡後便前往三一。彌香和老師去了很多地方和購物。偏偏卡片超過額度上限，讓彌香覺得很錯愕，但老師幫彌香結了帳。
desc.jp: 老師在接獲彌香的聯絡後便前往三一。彌香和老師去了很多地方和購物。偏偏卡片超過額度上限，讓彌香覺得很錯愕，但老師幫彌香結了帳。
desc.zh_cn: 老师在接获弥香的联系后便前往三一。弥香和老师去了很多地方和购物。偏偏卡片超过额度上限，让弥香觉得很错愕，但老师帮弥香结了帐。

desc.en: 為了購買禮物，三森約[USERNAME]老師一起去逛街。在糾結了許久後，三森決定買下一條手帕。後來，三森在那條手帕上刺下美麗的刺繡及她對老師的心意，並且將其送給了老師。
desc.jp: 為了購買禮物，三森約[USERNAME]老師一起去逛街。在糾結了許久後，三森決定買下一條手帕。後來，三森在那條手帕上刺下美麗的刺繡及她對老師的心意，並且將其送給了老師。
desc.zh_cn: 为了购买礼物，三森约[USERNAME]老师一起去逛街。在纠结了许久后，三森决定买下一条手帕。后来，三森在那条手帕上刺下美丽的刺绣及她对老师的心意，并且将其送给了老师。

desc.en: 美禰為了展示自己的收藏品，於是邀請老師去家裡。美禰在家裡針對各種醫療用品進行解說，但老師聽不太懂。後來美禰叫老師弄傷自己，老師好不容易才阻止了美禰。
desc.jp: 美禰為了展示自己的收藏品，於是邀請老師去家裡。美禰在家裡針對各種醫療用品進行解說，但老師聽不太懂。後來美禰叫老師弄傷自己，老師好不容易才阻止了美禰。
desc.zh_cn: 美祢为了展示自己的收藏品，于是邀请老师去家里。美祢在家里针对各种医疗用品进行解说，但老师听不太懂。后来美祢叫老师弄伤自己，老师好不容易才阻止了美祢。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
举例/联想：Aoharu
举例/联想：Aoharu

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: 自動販売機を蹴飛ばす御坂美琴を見かけた先生は、公共の器物を傷つけるのは良くないと注意する。曰く、元の世界でもよく自販機にお金を呑まれてしまい、こうして蹴っていたのだとか。そういう時はこうするのだと、先生は自販機に貼ってある連絡先に問い合わせ、修理してもらってお金とジュースを彼女に渡すのだった。
desc.jp: 自動販売機を蹴飛ばす御坂美琴を見かけた先生は、公共の器物を傷つけるのは良くないと注意する。曰く、元の世界でもよく自販機にお金を呑まれてしまい、こうして蹴っていたのだとか。そういう時はこうするのだと、先生は自販機に貼ってある連絡先に問い合わせ、修理してもらってお金とジュースを彼女に渡すのだった。
desc.zh_cn: 自动贩売机を蹴飞ばす御坂美琴を见かけた先生は、公共の器物を伤つけるのは良くないと注意する。曰く、元の世界でもよく自贩机にお金を呑まれてしまい、こうして蹴っていたのだとか。そういう时はこうするのだと、先生は自贩机に贴ってある连络先に问い合わせ、修理してもらってお金とジュースを彼女に渡すのだった。
BG_Park.jpg Description

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: 收到都子的聯絡後，老師前往百貨公司。都子正在煩惱要用別人送的商品券買什麼東西，拜託老師幫忙購物。在採買各種物資後，都子陷入苦惱，不知道買新泳裝的時候應該要以實用性還是以可愛造型為優先。
desc.jp: 收到都子的聯絡後，老師前往百貨公司。都子正在煩惱要用別人送的商品券買什麼東西，拜託老師幫忙購物。在採買各種物資後，都子陷入苦惱，不知道買新泳裝的時候應該要以實用性還是以可愛造型為優先。
desc.zh_cn: 收到都子的联系后，老师前往百货公司。都子正在烦恼要用别人送的商品券买什么东西，拜托老师帮忙购物。在采买各种物资后，都子陷入苦恼，不知道买新泳装的时候应该要以实用性还是以可爱造型为优先。

desc.en: 美優為了挽回在小隊裡犯下的錯誤，在半山腰的廢棄房屋裡，和老師一起進行狙擊訓練。在等待老師設置好靶紙回來的期間，有很各種各樣的野獸環繞在美優身邊，但是集中在狙擊訓練上的美優，卻以為是老師在跟他開玩笑而感到困擾。
desc.jp: 美優為了挽回在小隊裡犯下的錯誤，在半山腰的廢棄房屋裡，和老師一起進行狙擊訓練。在等待老師設置好靶紙回來的期間，有很各種各樣的野獸環繞在美優身邊，但是集中在狙擊訓練上的美優，卻以為是老師在跟他開玩笑而感到困擾。
desc.zh_cn: 美优为了挽回在小队里犯下的错误，在半山腰的废弃房屋里，和老师一起进行狙击训练。在等待老师设置好靶纸回来的期间，有很各种各样的野兽环绕在美优身边，但是集中在狙击训练上的美优，却以为是老师在跟他开玩笑而感到困扰。
BG_ForestRoad.jpg Description

desc.en: 某個休息日，老師在公園附近的散步小徑，發現了正在挑揀石頭的美優。美優說挑選感覺和自己一樣平凡的石頭是他的興趣，並邀請老師和他一起挑石頭。此後，美優和老師一起挑選礫石，度過歡樂時光。
desc.jp: 某個休息日，老師在公園附近的散步小徑，發現了正在挑揀石頭的美優。美優說挑選感覺和自己一樣平凡的石頭是他的興趣，並邀請老師和他一起挑石頭。此後，美優和老師一起挑選礫石，度過歡樂時光。
desc.zh_cn: 某个休息日，老师在公园附近的散步小径，发现了正在挑拣石头的美优。美优说挑选感觉和自己一样平凡的石头是他的兴趣，并邀请老师和他一起挑石头。此后，美优和老师一起挑选砾石，度过欢乐时光。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.en: 找到正在睡覺的老師後，無月拿了個多層便當盒給老師，並表示想送老師特別的禮物。然而，老師萬萬沒想到無月口中的禮物其實是她特製的炸彈。正在老師以為炸彈即將爆炸的瞬間，他才後知後覺地意識到這一切只是無月的惡作劇，並且為此鬆了一口氣。
desc.jp: 找到正在睡覺的老師後，無月拿了個多層便當盒給老師，並表示想送老師特別的禮物。然而，老師萬萬沒想到無月口中的禮物其實是她特製的炸彈。正在老師以為炸彈即將爆炸的瞬間，他才後知後覺地意識到這一切只是無月的惡作劇，並且為此鬆了一口氣。
desc.zh_cn: 找到正在睡觉的老师后，无月拿了个多层便当盒给老师，并表示想送老师特别的礼物。然而，老师万万没想到无月口中的礼物其实是她特制的炸弹。正在老师以为炸弹即将爆炸的瞬间，他才后知后觉地意识到这一切只是无月的恶作剧，并且为此松了一口气。

desc.en: 擠過擁擠的人潮後，老師和無月終於如願在繪馬上寫下了自己的願望。就在此時，無月忽然搶走了老師的繪馬，並擅自將他寫的願望唸出來。當老師發現無月的繪馬沒有寫任何字後，他便決定替無月寫下新年願望。
desc.jp: 擠過擁擠的人潮後，老師和無月終於如願在繪馬上寫下了自己的願望。就在此時，無月忽然搶走了老師的繪馬，並擅自將他寫的願望唸出來。當老師發現無月的繪馬沒有寫任何字後，他便決定替無月寫下新年願望。
desc.zh_cn: 挤过拥挤的人潮后，老师和无月终于如愿在绘马上写下了自己的愿望。就在此时，无月忽然抢走了老师的绘马，并擅自将他写的愿望念出来。当老师发现无月的绘马没有写任何字后，他便决定替无月写下新年愿望。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.en: 由於對什麼時候該穿什麼樣衣服沒有概念，寧瑠正大光明地穿著兔女郎裝走進了學校。感受到旁人的異樣眼光後，總算察覺不對勁的寧瑠叫住了老師。
desc.jp: 由於對什麼時候該穿什麼樣衣服沒有概念，寧瑠正大光明地穿著兔女郎裝走進了學校。感受到旁人的異樣眼光後，總算察覺不對勁的寧瑠叫住了老師。
desc.zh_cn: 由于对什么时候该穿什么样衣服没有概念，宁瑠正大光明地穿着兔女郎装走进了学校。感受到旁人的异样眼光后，总算察觉不对劲的宁瑠叫住了老师。

desc.en: 為了重建溫泉浴場，和香決定展開一場女將培訓。在進行廚藝訓練時，和香嘴上說要為老師準備會席料理，但卻端出了用廉價餅乾做成的怪異食物。
desc.jp: 為了重建溫泉浴場，和香決定展開一場女將培訓。在進行廚藝訓練時，和香嘴上說要為老師準備會席料理，但卻端出了用廉價餅乾做成的怪異食物。
desc.zh_cn: 为了重建温泉浴场，和香决定展开一场女将培训。在进行厨艺训练时，和香嘴上说要为老师准备会席料理，但却端出了用廉价饼干做成的怪异食物。
BG_CraftChamber.jpg Description

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 為了報答這段期間老師的幫忙，澪紗親自進行護送。雖然一起去很多地方，度過了忙碌的時光，卻沒能創造出特別的回憶，心中不免覺得遺憾。
desc.jp: 為了報答這段期間老師的幫忙，澪紗親自進行護送。雖然一起去很多地方，度過了忙碌的時光，卻沒能創造出特別的回憶，心中不免覺得遺憾。
desc.zh_cn: 为了报答这段期间老师的帮忙，澪纱亲自进行护送。虽然一起去很多地方，度过了忙碌的时光，却没能创造出特别的回忆，心中不免觉得遗憾。

BG_TrinityMarket.jpg Description

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 食事をとることすら忘れ、滞った仕事を処理していた先生は、レンゲの「青春活動」に付き合わされることに。そうして先生は過労で倒れてしまう。反省したレンゲは、自分のために頑張ってくれた先生に手作り弁当を渡すのだった。
desc.jp: 食事をとることすら忘れ、滞った仕事を処理していた先生は、レンゲの「青春活動」に付き合わされることに。そうして先生は過労で倒れてしまう。反省したレンゲは、自分のために頑張ってくれた先生に手作り弁当を渡すのだった。
desc.zh_cn: 食事をとることすら忘れ、滞った仕事を処理していた先生は、レンゲの「青春活动」に付き合わされることに。そうして先生は过労で倒れてしまう。反省したレンゲは、自分のために顽张ってくれた先生に手作り弁当を渡すのだった。

desc.en: 再度收到咲希的聯絡後，老師前往碼頭。咲希在村子倉庫裡發現名為刺突爆雷的工具，宣告這次一定要用它抓到魚。不過刺突爆雷的威力超乎預期的強烈，會讓射中的魚支離破碎。
desc.jp: 再度收到咲希的聯絡後，老師前往碼頭。咲希在村子倉庫裡發現名為刺突爆雷的工具，宣告這次一定要用它抓到魚。不過刺突爆雷的威力超乎預期的強烈，會讓射中的魚支離破碎。
desc.zh_cn: 再度收到咲希的联系后，老师前往码头。咲希在村子仓库里发现名为刺突爆雷的工具，声明这次一定要用它抓到鱼。不过刺突爆雷的威力超乎预期的强烈，会让射中的鱼支离破碎。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 沙耶為了協助在公園舉辦的活動，研發出一款「香味能讓身體放鬆」的香水，並向老師說明自己滑滑板的原因。沙耶滑著滑板將香水噴灑在公園各處，結果卻因為吸入太多香氣，導致身體過於放鬆而跌倒了。
desc.jp: 沙耶為了協助在公園舉辦的活動，研發出一款「香味能讓身體放鬆」的香水，並向老師說明自己滑滑板的原因。沙耶滑著滑板將香水噴灑在公園各處，結果卻因為吸入太多香氣，導致身體過於放鬆而跌倒了。
desc.zh_cn: 沙耶为了协助在公园举办的活动，研发出一款「香味能让身体放松」的香水，并向老师说明自己滑滑板的原因。沙耶滑着滑板将香水喷洒在公园各处，结果却因为吸入太多香气，导致身体过于放松而跌倒了。
BG_CitySqaure.jpg Description
【暂无】

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: 為了成為完美的巫女工讀生，茜香特地去找老師商量。雖然老師相當熱情地為她說明一名巫女該具備什麼樣的條件，但是當茜香口中說的只是他從遊戲和動漫中學來的知識後，她不僅感到有些惱怒。只是，當茜香意識到自己其實很喜歡和老師聊天時，她的臉頰便微微紅了起來。
desc.jp: 為了成為完美的巫女工讀生，茜香特地去找老師商量。雖然老師相當熱情地為她說明一名巫女該具備什麼樣的條件，但是當茜香口中說的只是他從遊戲和動漫中學來的知識後，她不僅感到有些惱怒。只是，當茜香意識到自己其實很喜歡和老師聊天時，她的臉頰便微微紅了起來。
desc.zh_cn: 为了成为完美的巫女工读生，茜香特地去找老师商量。虽然老师相当热情地为她说明一名巫女该具备什么样的条件，但是当茜香口中说的只是他从游戏和动漫中学来的知识后，她不仅感到有些恼怒。只是，当茜香意识到自己其实很喜欢和老师聊天时，她的脸颊便微微红了起来。
BG_Park.jpg Description
【暂无】

desc.en: 每當老師遇到麻煩的時候，芹奈總是會及時現身幫忙，因此老師便為芹奈準備了一場驚喜野餐會，想要藉機好好感謝她一次。雖然芹奈起初對這意料之外的展開有些不知所措，不過她很快便欣然地接受了老師的好意。
desc.jp: 每當老師遇到麻煩的時候，芹奈總是會及時現身幫忙，因此老師便為芹奈準備了一場驚喜野餐會，想要藉機好好感謝她一次。雖然芹奈起初對這意料之外的展開有些不知所措，不過她很快便欣然地接受了老師的好意。
desc.zh_cn: 每当老师遇到麻烦的时候，芹奈总是会及时现身帮忙，因此老师便为芹奈准备了一场惊喜野餐会，想要借机好好感谢她一次。虽然芹奈起初对这意料之外的展开有些不知所措，不过她很快便欣然地接受了老师的好意。
BG_Park.jpg Description

desc.en: 嘗試夢想許久，橫跨奇普托斯的白子。白子擔心自己會造成老師的擔心而猶豫不決，老師鼓勵她，於是她開始橫跨之旅。
desc.jp: 嘗試夢想許久，橫跨奇普托斯的白子。白子擔心自己會造成老師的擔心而猶豫不決，老師鼓勵她，於是她開始橫跨之旅。
desc.zh_cn: 尝试梦想许久，横跨奇普托斯的白子。白子担心自己会造成老师的担心而犹豫不决，老师鼓励她，于是她开始横跨之旅。
BG_SchoolFrontGate.jpg Description

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.zh_cn: Blue Archive's first original soundtrack.

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 商店街を歩いていた食蜂は、団体客がアルバイトを困らせている姿を目撃する。先生が間に入ろうとするも、先に食蜂は持参していたリモコンのボタンを押し、事態を収拾するのだった。

desc.en: 前往奇普托斯中區新開幕的室內遊樂場觀摩的旬與老師。旬以安全檢查為藉口，用變小的身體玩了很多遊樂設施。
desc.jp: 前往奇普托斯中區新開幕的室內遊樂場觀摩的旬與老師。旬以安全檢查為藉口，用變小的身體玩了很多遊樂設施。
desc.zh_cn: 前往奇普托斯中区新开幕的室内游乐场观摩的旬与老师。旬以安全检查为借口，用变小的身体玩了很多游乐设施。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: 變年輕的旬綁了很久沒綁卻很喜歡的髮型，因此感到十分愉快。老師問她長大後不也可以綁一樣的髮型嗎，旬卻回答說年紀大了之後，會覺得害羞所以沒辦法那樣做。老師向那樣的旬提出了一個建議。
desc.jp: 變年輕的旬綁了很久沒綁卻很喜歡的髮型，因此感到十分愉快。老師問她長大後不也可以綁一樣的髮型嗎，旬卻回答說年紀大了之後，會覺得害羞所以沒辦法那樣做。老師向那樣的旬提出了一個建議。
desc.zh_cn: 变年轻的旬绑了很久没绑却很喜欢的发型，因此感到十分愉快。老师问她长大后不也可以绑一样的发型吗，旬却回答说年纪大了之后，会觉得害羞所以没办法那样做。老师向那样的旬提出了一个建议。
BG_ShanStreet.jpg Description

desc.en: 堇基於這段時間的訓練經驗，建議老師也進行肌力訓練。突如其來的肌力訓練讓老師感到非常痛苦。堇一面安慰著老師，表情看起來非常開心。
desc.jp: 堇基於這段時間的訓練經驗，建議老師也進行肌力訓練。突如其來的肌力訓練讓老師感到非常痛苦。堇一面安慰著老師，表情看起來非常開心。
desc.zh_cn: 堇基于这段时间的训练经验，建议老师也进行肌力训练。突如其来的肌力训练让老师感到非常痛苦。堇一面安慰着老师，表情看起来非常开心。

desc.en: 不小心把愛用的枕頭弄壞的椿。為了購買新枕頭來替換，椿和老師前往超市。但是椿一直找不到喜歡的枕頭，最後選擇枕在老師的大腿上。
desc.jp: 不小心把愛用的枕頭弄壞的椿。為了購買新枕頭來替換，椿和老師前往超市。但是椿一直找不到喜歡的枕頭，最後選擇枕在老師的大腿上。
desc.zh_cn: 不小心把爱用的枕头弄坏的椿。为了购买新枕头来替换，椿和老师前往超市。但是椿一直找不到喜欢的枕头，最后选择枕在老师的大腿上。

desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: 對申請諮詢為了成為體面的忍者，該做什麼才好的月夜，老師建議他要不要從自己最擅長的事情開始試試看。聽了老師那麼說，月夜就展示了自己最擅長的樹木變裝術，讓老師嚇了一跳。
desc.jp: 對申請諮詢為了成為體面的忍者，該做什麼才好的月夜，老師建議他要不要從自己最擅長的事情開始試試看。聽了老師那麼說，月夜就展示了自己最擅長的樹木變裝術，讓老師嚇了一跳。
desc.zh_cn: 对申请咨询为了成为体面的忍者，该做什么才好的月夜，老师建议他要不要从自己最擅长的事情开始试试看。听了老师那么说，月夜就展示了自己最擅长的树木变装术，让老师吓了一跳。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 帶著興奮的心情來到海邊的弦生。但是人們把弦生誤認為是水鬼所以都逃走了。獨自留下來的弦生與老師度過了兩人時光。
desc.jp: 帶著興奮的心情來到海邊的弦生。但是人們把弦生誤認為是水鬼所以都逃走了。獨自留下來的弦生與老師度過了兩人時光。
desc.zh_cn: 带着兴奋的心情来到海边的弦生。但是人们把弦生误认为是水鬼所以都逃走了。独自留下来的弦生与老师度过了两人时光。

desc.en: 「完美的夏日回憶」計劃沒有結束。認為老師心裡還有想做的事的若藻，和老師做了「約會」的約定。然而，每次約會時老師都會被煙火大會準備的問題叫回去……。持續被打擾約會的若藻終於，認為如果沒有把老師叫走好幾次煙火大會的存在就好，下定決定引爆倉庫。面對在倉庫胡鬧的若藻，老師強烈的斥責了。
desc.jp: 「完美的夏日回憶」計劃沒有結束。認為老師心裡還有想做的事的若藻，和老師做了「約會」的約定。然而，每次約會時老師都會被煙火大會準備的問題叫回去……。持續被打擾約會的若藻終於，認為如果沒有把老師叫走好幾次煙火大會的存在就好，下定決定引爆倉庫。面對在倉庫胡鬧的若藻，老師強烈的斥責了。
desc.zh_cn: 「完美的夏日回忆」计划没有结束。认为老师心里还有想做的事的若藻，和老师做了「约会」的约定。然而，每次约会时老师都会被烟火大会准备的问题叫回去……。持续被打扰约会的若藻终于，认为如果没有把老师叫走好几次烟火大会的存在就好，下定决定引爆仓库。面对在仓库胡闹的若藻，老师强烈的斥责了。

desc.en: 參加馬卡龍競食大賽的喜美和老師。面對馬卡龍甜膩的滋味，兩人吃不下太多馬卡龍而陷入苦戰。但是不小心坐在老師身上的喜美為了掩飾尷尬，一眨眼的工夫就把馬卡龍吃個精光，於是兩人獲得了大賽冠軍。
desc.jp: 參加馬卡龍競食大賽的喜美和老師。面對馬卡龍甜膩的滋味，兩人吃不下太多馬卡龍而陷入苦戰。但是不小心坐在老師身上的喜美為了掩飾尷尬，一眨眼的工夫就把馬卡龍吃個精光，於是兩人獲得了大賽冠軍。
desc.zh_cn: 参加马卡龙竞食大赛的喜美和老师。面对马卡龙甜腻的滋味，两人吃不下太多马卡龙而陷入苦战。但是不小心坐在老师身上的喜美为了掩饰尴尬，一眨眼的工夫就把马卡龙吃个精光，于是两人获得了大赛冠军。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: 清晨，老師在公園步道遇見了正在慢跑的優香。優香正在為了千年主辦的大運動會進行特訓中。優香說自己對耐力很有自信。但優香的體力很快就耗盡了，完全和誇下海口時判若兩人。
desc.jp: 清晨，老師在公園步道遇見了正在慢跑的優香。優香正在為了千年主辦的大運動會進行特訓中。優香說自己對耐力很有自信。但優香的體力很快就耗盡了，完全和誇下海口時判若兩人。
desc.zh_cn: 清晨，老师在公园步道遇见了正在慢跑的优香。优香正在为了千年主办的大运动会进行特训中。优香说自己对耐力很有自信。但优香的体力很快就耗尽了，完全和夸下海口时判若两人。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 外勤中的老師為了觀察柚子的狀況，於是便前往她打工的女僕咖啡廳。老師的出現讓柚子頓時很緊張，表現失常接二連三發生了失誤。稍後。休息時間已經過了，柚子依舊沒有回來，老師基於擔心就去找柚子，因此看見了令人意外的景象。
desc.jp: 外勤中的老師為了觀察柚子的狀況，於是便前往她打工的女僕咖啡廳。老師的出現讓柚子頓時很緊張，表現失常接二連三發生了失誤。稍後。休息時間已經過了，柚子依舊沒有回來，老師基於擔心就去找柚子，因此看見了令人意外的景象。
desc.zh_cn: 外勤中的老师为了观察柚子的状况，于是便前往她打工的女仆咖啡厅。老师的出现让柚子顿时很紧张，表现失常接二连三发生了失误。稍后。休息时间已经过了，柚子依旧没有回来，老师基于担心就去找柚子，因此看见了令人意外的景象。

name.en: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.jp: A Day in the Life of Serika

desc.en: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪芹香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是芹香依然一副没好气的样子。芹香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪芹香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是芹香依然一副没好气的样子。芹香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。

desc.en: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.jp: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师撞见了芹香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。芹香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；芹香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师撞见了茜香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。茜香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；茜香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师撞见了芹香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。芹香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；芹香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。

desc.en: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.jp: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十一首曲子，常在“招聘”（抽卡）页面播放。
举例/联想：Aoharu

desc.en: Sensei brings the rest of the Foreclosure Task Force to the very ramen store that Serika is working for. Though surprised, Serika leads the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposes to pay with her cards, but Sensei does that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returns to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.jp: Sensei brings the rest of the Foreclosure Task Force to the very ramen store that Serika is working for. Though surprised, Serika leads the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposes to pay with her cards, but Sensei does that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returns to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了芹香打工的拉面店，芹香大为震撼。然后，芹香带领大家就坐；之后，野宫主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在芹香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了芹香打工的拉面店，芹香大为震撼。然后，芹香带领大家就坐；之后，野宫主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在芹香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 顺利从头盔团手中救出芹香的老师和对策委员会学生们。战斗后，绫音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 顺利从头盔团手中救出茜香的老师和对策委员会学生们。战斗后，绫音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 顺利从头盔团手中救出芹香的老师和对策委员会学生们。战斗后，绫音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。

desc.en: Though Serika is rescued, she still falls apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Shiroko brings Serika to the infirmary. Ayane finds out that the Helmet Gang seem to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a mastermind in the dark.
desc.jp: Though Serika is rescued, she still falls apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Shiroko brings Serika to the infirmary. Ayane finds out that the Helmet Gang seem to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a mastermind in the dark.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然救出了芹香，但吃了一发防空导弹的芹香还是支棱不住。白子将芹香送到了医护室。绫音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 虽然救出了茜香，但吃了一发防空导弹的茜香还是支棱不住。白子将茜香送到了医护室。绫音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 虽然救出了芹香，但吃了一发防空导弹的芹香还是支棱不住。白子将芹香送到了医护室。绫音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
BG_UpperOffice_Night.jpg Description
BG_CityOffice_Night.jpg Description
BG_CS_Gehenna_01.jpg Description

desc.en: Sensei visits Serika. Though still doesn't trust Sensei, she thanks Sensei and leaves in a hurry.

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.
desc.zh_cn: 对策委员会的定期会议日。学生们左思右想偿还9亿日圆的方法，但却想不到好办法。老师和学生们结束会议后去吃拉面，结果却遇到穷困潦倒的便利屋职员。

desc.en: The regular meeting for Abydos Foreclosure Task Force begins, as everyone purposes their own way to pay the debt.
desc.jp: The regular meeting for Abydos Foreclosure Task Force begins, as everyone purposes their own way to pay the debt.
desc.zh_cn: 阿拜多斯对策委员会的日常会议开始，大家纷纷提出自己的对于还债的具体方法。

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

BG_CommitteeRoom.jpg Description

desc.en: Hoshino points out that the root cause of being unable to pay is because the students left. Therefore it'll be fine as soon as they hijack students from other schools. Denied by Ayane.
desc.jp: Hoshino points out that the root cause of being unable to pay is because the students left. Therefore it'll be fine as soon as they hijack students from other schools. Denied by Ayane.
desc.zh_cn: 星野指出，阿拜多斯还不起债的根本在于学生出走，因而只要把其他学校的学生劫持过来就好。被绫音否决。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Shiroko straights to the plan of robbing a bank, saying that she has found out everything and in that way, they will be able to earn 100 million in just five minutes. Criminal as it is, it is denied by Ayane and Serika.
desc.jp: Shiroko straights to the plan of robbing a bank, saying that she has found out everything and in that way, they will be able to earn 100 million in just five minutes. Criminal as it is, it is denied by Ayane and Serika.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 白子开门见山地提出了抢银行的计划，表示对于银行的种种都已经摸清，且五分钟就能赚一个亿。因为本身犯罪，被绫音和芹香驳回。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: As the dispute erupts, Sensei is forced to make a choice. But even Sensei's choice disappoints Ayane and makes her overturn the table angrily. Everyone is under a good lecture later.
desc.jp: As the dispute erupts, Sensei is forced to make a choice. But even Sensei's choice disappoints Ayane and makes her overturn the table angrily. Everyone is under a good lecture later.
desc.zh_cn: 众人争执不下，于是让老师做出选择。但老师的选择令绫音大失所望，怒掀桌子。之后所有人被好好说教了一番。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

name.en: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.jp: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68

desc.en: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.jp: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。阿露跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。亚瑠跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。爱露跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。阿露被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。亚瑠被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。爱露被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。

desc.en: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.jp: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得阿露和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得亚瑠和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得爱露和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。

desc.en: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.jp: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒阿露他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，阿露最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒亚瑠他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，亚瑠最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒爱露他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，爱露最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。

desc.en: The Problem Solver 68 meet the hired mercenaries and are ready to attack. Meanwhile, Abydos notices the marching enemies, only to find out it is the doings of Problem Solver 68 that they meets in the ramen store.
desc.jp: The Problem Solver 68 meet the hired mercenaries and are ready to attack. Meanwhile, Abydos notices the marching enemies, only to find out it is the doings of Problem Solver 68 that they meets in the ramen store.
desc.zh_cn: 便利屋68与雇佣兵集合，准备进攻。阿拜多斯方面也注意到了正在行进的敌人队伍，却意外发现就是在拉面店里遇到的便利屋68一行人所为。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Unsurprisingly, the Problem Solver 68 is defeated completely. As the off-work time arrives, the Problem Solver 68 lose their backup and are forced to retreat.
desc.jp: Unsurprisingly, the Problem Solver 68 is defeated completely. As the off-work time arrives, the Problem Solver 68 lose their backup and are forced to retreat.
desc.zh_cn: 便利屋68不出意外地完全失败。由于此时已经到了下班时间，丧失支援的便利屋68不得不撤退。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.jp: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝和千禧年的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和工程部见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来爱丽丝遇见尼禄，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在爱丽丝也能笑着说尼禄是自己的同伴。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝和千年的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和工程师部见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来爱丽丝遇见宁瑠，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在爱丽丝也能笑着说宁瑠是自己的同伴。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝和千年的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和工程部见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来爱丽丝遇见妮露，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在爱丽丝也能笑着说妮露是自己的同伴。

desc.en: Aris met other Millennium students at the school square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. Aris was even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.jp: Aris met other Millennium students at the school square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. Aris was even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在千禧年广场遇到了其他千禧年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Aris met the three of the Engineering Department. The three said they were out seeking for some new equipments. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在校园里见到了工程部三人，后者表示是出来搜罗新装备的。歌原问爱丽丝光之剑近况如何，爱丽丝则表示在很爱护地使用着。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.jp: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝叫尼禄“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，尼禄不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。尼禄虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝叫宁瑠“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，宁瑠不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。宁瑠虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝叫妮露“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，妮露不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。妮露虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。

desc.en: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.jp: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师对爱丽丝居然不害怕尼禄感到惊讶，而爱丽丝则表示是因为尼禄现在已经是个伙伴了。老师对能了解爱丽丝的生活感到开心。虽然没能完成柚子布置的任务，但爱丽丝还是很开心，并且表示勇者是不会轻易放弃的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师对爱丽丝居然不害怕宁瑠感到惊讶，而爱丽丝则表示是因为宁瑠现在已经是个伙伴了。老师对能了解爱丽丝的生活感到开心。虽然没能完成柚子布置的任务，但爱丽丝还是很开心，并且表示勇者是不会轻易放弃的。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师对爱丽丝居然不害怕妮露感到惊讶，而爱丽丝则表示是因为妮露现在已经是个伙伴了。老师对能了解爱丽丝的生活感到开心。虽然没能完成柚子布置的任务，但爱丽丝还是很开心，并且表示勇者是不会轻易放弃的。

desc.en:
因為接到了傳統喫茶店「百夜堂」的看板娘突然打來的電話，
老師決定前往百鬼夜行聯合學園的祭典「百夜之春櫻花祭」！
但是神祕的問題兒童們和忍者女孩卻正在那裡作亂！？
狂亂的祭典騷動，即將開始！

因為接到了傳統喫茶店「百夜堂」的看板娘突然打來的電話，

但是神祕的問題兒童們和忍者女孩卻正在那裡作亂！？
狂亂的祭典騷動，即將開始！

因为接到了传统吃茶店「百夜堂」的看板娘突然打来的电话，
老师决定前往百鬼夜行联合学园的祭典「百夜之春樱花祭」！
但是神秘的问题儿童们和忍者女孩却正在那里作乱！？
狂乱的祭典骚动，即将开始！

desc.en: 為了解決問題而來到陰陽部的老師和靜子。迎接兩位的是做俳句的電波系少女知世。話說得模糊不清的知世建議他們兩人到修行部。這兩人來到街上時，又再次受到妖怪劇團的襲擊。
desc.jp: 為了解決問題而來到陰陽部的老師和靜子。迎接兩位的是做俳句的電波系少女知世。話說得模糊不清的知世建議他們兩人到修行部。這兩人來到街上時，又再次受到妖怪劇團的襲擊。
desc.zh_cn: 为了解决问题而来到阴阳部的老师和静子。迎接两位的是做俳句的电波系少女知世。话说得模糊不清的知世建议他们两人到修行部。这两人来到街上时，又再次受到妖怪剧团的袭击。

desc.zh_cn: Blue Archive's first original soundtrack.

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 梅花園的教官旬，喝了從沙耶那裡得到的「回春秘藥」，回到了小時候的樣子！隨著身體的變化，心也變年幼的她，在山海經的各處引起了各種麻煩……！？

desc.en: 小旬和老師來到公園，在那裡遇見了心菜。心菜雖然有些懷疑，但沒有識破。小旬和心菜最終發生了一場小爭吵。

desc.en: 重新開始執行巡邏工作後，居民們為了感謝夏萊的老師對奇普托斯的付出送上了禮物。老師感到不知所措，但瀬奈說這是居民對於自己與老師過去一年的付出所送上的謝禮，那份感激也是他們的真心。就在這溫馨的時刻，兩人接到若藻再次逃獄的消息。
desc.jp: 重新開始執行巡邏工作後，居民們為了感謝夏萊的老師對奇普托斯的付出送上了禮物。老師感到不知所措，但瀬奈說這是居民對於自己與老師過去一年的付出所送上的謝禮，那份感激也是他們的真心。就在這溫馨的時刻，兩人接到若藻再次逃獄的消息。
desc.zh_cn: 重新开始运行巡逻工作后，居民们为了感谢夏莱的老师对奇普托斯的付出送上了礼物。老师感到不知所措，但瀬奈说这是居民对于自己与老师过去一年的付出所送上的谢礼，那份感激也是他们的真心。就在这温馨的时刻，两人接到若藻再次逃狱的消息。

BG_Park.jpg Description

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry

desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: 狐坂若藻的沉默與祝宴
name.jp: 狐坂若藻的沉默與祝宴
name.zh_cn: 狐坂若藻的沉默与祝宴

desc.en:
伴隨著吵雜的槍聲、華麗的爆炸聲…以及嗆鼻的火藥味！
惡名昭彰的若藻現身了！
若藻在情人節慶典會場中製造混亂的真正目的究竟為何？！
desc.jp:
伴隨著吵雜的槍聲、華麗的爆炸聲…以及嗆鼻的火藥味！
惡名昭彰的若藻現身了！
若藻在情人節慶典會場中製造混亂的真正目的究竟為何？！
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的若藻现身了！
若藻在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: 星野和茜香總算是成功擊退了良舞以及頭盔團。然而，因為戰鬥使原本已經打掃乾淨的房間又變得亂糟糟的……不巧，這時白子和野乃美正好回來，看見了這副髒亂的模樣，便以為他們都在偷懶。
desc.jp: 星野和茜香總算是成功擊退了良舞以及頭盔團。然而，因為戰鬥使原本已經打掃乾淨的房間又變得亂糟糟的……不巧，這時白子和野乃美正好回來，看見了這副髒亂的模樣，便以為他們都在偷懶。
desc.zh_cn: 星野和茜香总算是成功击退了良舞以及头盔团。然而，因为战斗使原本已经打扫干净的房间又变得乱糟糟的……不巧，这时白子和野乃美正好回来，看见了这副脏乱的模样，便以为他们都在偷懒。

name.en: 阿拜多斯渡假勝地復原對策委員會
name.jp: 阿拜多斯渡假勝地復原對策委員會
name.zh_cn: 阿拜多斯渡假胜地复原对策委员会

desc.en:
對策委員會一行人意外地前往了無人島的渡假勝地。
然而等待著他們的卻是已經成為廢墟的渡假勝地、頭盔團的襲擊，以及若藻！究竟對策委員會能否順利度過暑假呢？
desc.jp:
對策委員會一行人意外地前往了無人島的渡假勝地。
然而等待著他們的卻是已經成為廢墟的渡假勝地、頭盔團的襲擊，以及若藻！究竟對策委員會能否順利度過暑假呢？
desc.zh_cn:
对策委员会一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及若藻！究竟对策委员会能否顺利度过暑假呢？

desc.en: 老師看到瑪麗忙著幫助他人而勸他吃午餐。瑪麗和老師前往玄武商會的攤販享用遲來的午餐。過程中店員不小心燙傷了，老師便帶店員去聯合醫療本部。不知道為什麼，治療患者的芹奈和瀬奈阻止老師進去醫護站。
desc.jp: 老師看到瑪麗忙著幫助他人而勸他吃午餐。瑪麗和老師前往玄武商會的攤販享用遲來的午餐。過程中店員不小心燙傷了，老師便帶店員去聯合醫療本部。不知道為什麼，治療患者的芹奈和瀬奈阻止老師進去醫護站。
desc.zh_cn: 老师看到玛丽忙着帮助他人而劝他吃午餐。玛丽和老师前往玄武商会的摊贩享用迟来的午餐。过程中店员不小心烫伤了，老师便带店员去联合医疗本部。不知道为什么，治疗患者的芹奈和瀬奈阻止老师进去医护站。

name.en: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.jp: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.jp: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯运动大会「晄轮大祭」终于开始了。各个学园齐聚一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？

desc.en: 當千尋完成研討會委託的工作時，詠葉來到他身邊，兩人一起顧了在大運動會中發生的事。詠葉開玩笑地勸千尋也加入應援團，但被千尋果斷拒絕。
desc.jp: 當千尋完成研討會委託的工作時，詠葉來到他身邊，兩人一起顧了在大運動會中發生的事。詠葉開玩笑地勸千尋也加入應援團，但被千尋果斷拒絕。
desc.zh_cn: 当千寻完成研讨会委托的工作时，咏叶来到他身边，两人一起顾了在大运动会中发生的事。咏叶开玩笑地劝千寻也加入应援团，但被千寻果断拒绝。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

name.en: 純白的預告信～虛飾之館與美學所在之處～
name.jp: 純白的預告信～虛飾之館與美學所在之處～
name.zh_cn: 纯白的预告信～虚饰之馆与美学所在之处～

desc.en: 桃井在遊戲中心收到了「打掃」的委託。委託人將桃井誤認為C&C的寧瑠──沒注意到這點就接下委託的桃井和遊戲開發部一行人決定換上女僕裝扮演C&C。究竟一行人能否順利達成委託呢？
desc.jp: 桃井在遊戲中心收到了「打掃」的委託。委託人將桃井誤認為C&C的寧瑠──沒注意到這點就接下委託的桃井和遊戲開發部一行人決定換上女僕裝扮演C&C。究竟一行人能否順利達成委託呢？
desc.zh_cn: 桃井在游戏中心收到了「打扫」的委托。委托人将桃井误认为C&C的宁瑠──没注意到这点就接下委托的桃井和游戏开发部一行人决定换上女仆装扮演C&C。究竟一行人能否顺利达成委托呢？

desc.en: 在一連串的事件過後，夜戶浦村從不祥的漁村搖身一變成為充滿活力的觀光漁港，D.U.的蝦子流通也恢復正常。RABBIT小隊成員們回到兔寶寶公園後，收到一份來自夜戶浦村的包裹。
desc.jp: 在一連串的事件過後，夜戶浦村從不祥的漁村搖身一變成為充滿活力的觀光漁港，D.U.的蝦子流通也恢復正常。RABBIT小隊成員們回到兔寶寶公園後，收到一份來自夜戶浦村的包裹。
desc.zh_cn: 在一连串的事件过后，夜户浦村从不祥的渔村摇身一变成为充满活力的观光渔港，D.U.的虾子流通也恢复正常。RABBIT小队成员们回到兔宝宝公园后，收到一份来自夜户浦村的包裹。

desc.en: 某個炎熱的夏日，和往常一樣吃著便利商店便當的RABBIT小隊隊員發現最近蝦子從便當中消失了──為了調查消失蝦子的下落，一行人決定偽裝成觀光客潛入漁村。究竟RABBIT小隊能否順利取回蝦子呢？
desc.jp: 某個炎熱的夏日，和往常一樣吃著便利商店便當的RABBIT小隊隊員發現最近蝦子從便當中消失了──為了調查消失蝦子的下落，一行人決定偽裝成觀光客潛入漁村。究竟RABBIT小隊能否順利取回蝦子呢？

desc.en: 一花的任務是找回帶三一的貴重文物，並協助參與挖掘工作的老師。一花很高興有機會和老師一起工作，欣然接受任務。但載著文物的列車，卻駛向了其他目的地……？
desc.jp: 一花的任務是找回帶三一的貴重文物，並協助參與挖掘工作的老師。一花很高興有機會和老師一起工作，欣然接受任務。但載著文物的列車，卻駛向了其他目的地……？
desc.zh_cn: 一花的任务是找回带三一的贵重文物，并协助参与挖掘工作的老师。一花很高兴有机会和老师一起工作，欣然接受任务。但载着文物的列车，却驶向了其他目的地……？

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en:
在將文物移送至三一的途中，一花和老師發現委託載運的列車正開往其他目的地。
匆忙搭上列車後，發現上頭竟然有格黑娜的通緝犯──！？
究竟，大家能平安地將文物帶回三一嗎？
desc.jp:
在將文物移送至三一的途中，一花和老師發現委託載運的列車正開往其他目的地。
匆忙搭上列車後，發現上頭竟然有格黑娜的通緝犯──！？
究竟，大家能平安地將文物帶回三一嗎？
desc.zh_cn:
在将文物移送至三一的途中，一花和老师发现委托载运的列车正开往其他目的地。
匆忙搭上列车后，发现上头竟然有格黑娜的通缉犯──！？
究竟，大家能平安地将文物带回三一吗？

desc.en: 美禰的救援行動雖然平息了小流氓們的騷動，但公安局依舊沒有出動。聽見公安局沒有出動的理由後，美禰提出強烈的抗議，若藻則趁機從容地逃走了。
desc.jp: 美禰的救援行動雖然平息了小流氓們的騷動，但公安局依舊沒有出動。聽見公安局沒有出動的理由後，美禰提出強烈的抗議，若藻則趁機從容地逃走了。
desc.zh_cn: 美祢的救援行动虽然平息了小流氓们的骚动，但公安局依旧没有出动。听见公安局没有出动的理由后，美祢提出强烈的抗议，若藻则趁机从容地逃走了。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
